author: Jennifer Stark

review: Audio and pictures aren't always in sync and they picture often freeze.I have isolated the problem to fire TV stick as I never have the same issue when I watch content on my phone or ipad or apple TV in the same location as the TV stick.My advice spend the extra money and get something more robust like apple TV box
author: Amie A. Picard

review: The Fire TV Stick is very easy to set up and use. With Prime membership there is a great deal of content available. I find myself using it for music and tv shows most of the time.I wish it had capability for bluetooth headphones though.
author: Joseph Knasinski

review: I have a google chromecast stick and I decided to buy Amazon Fire TV because of the remote control. The advertising is great, however it does not alert you for the region restrictions.Once I plugged the fire tv stick on my TV in Brazil I was surprised by the lack of apps. I knew that Prime content has region restrictions, but no excuses for applications. Any device today has the full set of apps regardless of your country, not even the simple youtube is available.The only useful app that was allowed to install is NetFlix, which does not make any difference since I have it on the samsung smartv where the stick is installed.If I had a chance I would return my order for sure, however it will cost more than the stick value for an international shipping.
author: Wagner

review: Love the Fire TV Stick. It is easy to install, easy to use, and the layout of the app is very easy to navigate. Works really well in conjunction with my Prime membership, I can even start watching something on my Kindle Fire and seamlessly transfer right to my television through the fire stick.
author: kmh518

review: This little stick is great. I love how easy it is to navigate with the remote on my phone. However I cannot connect to my local cable company Comcast so I cannot watch my premium channels or any TV channels.
author: Alyse Harris
